He 106MBIMCb BLIHYALeHHEX 1Okasan*, nepeBOIVVK npexy- npexMJ CynpyH, ro b aJbHemeM aa "HencrpeHne" nOkasaHn na onpoce ona yeT nonyaTb no 25 naok M oy^eT savra Ha- cMepTb. B abhefmem npn qonpocax ee Tak I0 norep coshs- HMH vsuBaJ TOT ze oduep recrano. CTAJIIHO AKT 1943 ropa, cenrapa 22-ro AHH, ropox CraJHo Mm, HwenopnucaBweCH: npegcegareJb CraJno-3aBO]- CKOro paoHHoro coBera genyraToB TpyAAIIXCH CoJOBbeB EpMaK TumoeeBM, cerperapb CraJno-3aBOCKoro paon- noro cOBera xenyraToB TpyqaIMXCH HKOBJeB HMkoJa Muxa- JIOBMH, sasexyon ropsupaBOTReJIOM npoceccop JXOKTOp MeAM- IVHBI Banap Aekcei WocuoBM, npoceccop CraHCKoro MeMHCTMTryra AcanacbeB Muxam KOHCTaHTHHOBH, nporo- wepe HacTOHreJIb HMkoJaeBCKo IepKBM HepHHBCKM oren HaHnMJI, xperrop IeHTpaJbHo IOJIMKJIMIHMKM MjIbHHCKMil Aurekce AuercaHApOBM, ropoACko cyqeHb Bpa Muxa- JIeBa, opHarop-OHKoJTor 60JBHMIBI Bpa TokapeBa Anna KysbMMHMHHa, Mafiop MeMVIVHCKO CJryAbI BOeHBpa yacr 11956 IIIMamH aBMA JIasapeBM, Kanuran MeIHCKoK CJybI BOeHBpa vacT 11956 EopTHMK HMkoa BuaMKpo- BM, bBIIe BOeHHOIIIeHHbe kpacnoapmelbI aToro Jareps IlIarku KOHCTaHTMH CeMeHOBMY, IIuaxoHOB VBaH Bacnbe- BMH, oveBMgeI, AKMTeJTb Crano-BaBOACkorO paona Crer- HeHKO MBaH CrenanoBV, npegcraBMreJIM OT npodopranmaamxi CraJHo-3aBOCKorO paora IIerpeHEO Auppe CemeHOBM, JIunaTOB Buamup MurpoaHOBM•, KHAyX Tpuropn Ba- CMJIbeBHV, mpencraBMreJIM OT MHreJIIMreHIIM CraHo-3aBOA- CKoro paiona CBaTKOBCKas Haxenga IIaBIOBHa, CaBOCbKMHa JIIpMMJIa AnxpeeBHa, TepeneHKO IIpacKOBbA MBaHOBHa, npo- M3BeJIM pacKOIIKM omux MOrMJI na reppuropuM KJya MM, JIeHuHa, rge cxopoHeHEI 3amyyeHHbe H paccrpeHHbe COBeT- CKHe BoeHHonTeHHbe. AET 0 3BEPCTBAX, COBEPIUEHHMX HEMEIKO- PAIIMCTCKHMM 3AXBATMMEAMM HA AJIEBACTPOBBIX KAPbEPAX B OKPECTHOCTAIX r. APTEMOBCKA CTAJIHHCKOR OBJIACTM AKT CoruacHo 3aHBJIeHMIO Auree r. ApTeMOBcna, b IIPpRCYTCTBMM npercraBureJIH HpeaBLinaiiHOii TocyqapcrBeHHoM Komhcchh no ycTaHOBJIeHWIO 310 nemenko-dpamcTCRWX OKKynanTOB KyapsBIeBa IMMTPMH MBaHOBna, KOMHCCHH B cocraBe mpep- cexareJIH KOMHCCHH yena MCnOJIHMTeJIBHoro KOMMrera CrajH- CKoro oacTHoro coBeTa genyraroB rpysIXCH 3aB. oJ- 3ApaBoTeJIOM Jyposo DerJIbI TaBpMJIOBHBI H yJeHOB KO MHCCHH — npocpeccopa {OKropa MeAMIMHCKVX nayn Boftnap Aercen MocuoBuya, npodeccopa ROEropa MeJMIMHCRWX nayK Hapyrura Anxpes MBaHOBua, maiopa MeMIIHCRo CIy»OEI ApamoBa Anxpen AuxpeeBua, npegcexareJs ApTCMOBCKOrO ropoxCkoro coBera Baanna egopa AHTOHOBwa, nacroAreJIH BcexCBHTCKO IepKBM CBHIeHHMKa KpenaHOBCKoro MoanHa KceHOoH’TOBMya H AwreJe r. ApTCMOBCKa, cBwgereJek 3310- enuM, IIpygeHKO Cugopa depopoBna, EneHKO degopa AH- TOHOBima, OpaTOBCKoro Muxamua CrenaHOBna npovsBea 3/X 1943 roga ocmotp AueacTpoBbIX kapbepoB h ycraHOBMJa cuexyronee: B ByX KwIoMerpax k BOCTOKy ot r. ApTeMOBcna, b TYHHeJe KapbepoB AnefiacTpoBoro 3aBoqa, Ha paccTOHHMM 400 MeTpOB ot Bxoa HMeeTcn HeOJbiloe OTBepcTne, 3aMypoBaHHoe kwpnM- HOM. IIoce BCKPBITMH roro OTBepCTHH onapyaeHO npo- oJnkeune TYHHeJIH b BMge y3Koro npoxoga, KpyTO IIO[BIMalo- nerocs BBepx h 3araHHMBaroneroca niHpoKOii OBaJbHo nerepo 30 20 MeTpOB IMHBI, 30 MeTpOB MIMpMHBI h 3—4 MeTpOB BBICOTBI. Ben nenepa 3arouera TpynamM noge, JIMIIIb neOJIbloe npocrpaHCTBO y Bxoga h y3Kan noJoca b erTpe ee CBOOHHBI ot TpynOB. Bee OHM tbcho npMaaTbI OAIH k Apyromy h opaneHBI cnHnaMH k BXOHOMy OTBepcTMIO nenepb. Tpynb HaCTOJIBKO 6jih3ko compkacaTCR, hto na nepBb BBrJIHA npecTaBJISIOT coo cnJomnyr Macey reJI, enerHHBIX xpyr c apyroM. 3axuve pHBI reJ HasaJeHBI na nepeguMe, npraTbe k creHKaM nenepBI, h HarpoMo?geHBI b HecKOJIbKO pnsoB, 3acTLiBmnx b croATeM 31o KOJieHOripeKJIOHCHHOM nOJTO2keHMM. Buarogapn ocoenHOCTHM MeCTHEIX ycJOBM (OTHOCMTeJIbHo cyxocTH Bo3yxa, HM3KO h paBHoMepHo remneparype, no- pHCTOMy any nenepb) IpomsOlLa MYMMMRanMH TpynOB, H 60JIBIIHCTBO H3 HHX OTJIMUHO coxpaHVJIOCb. Ogenga na Bcex Tpynax shmhhh, naJBTO h xpyroe Bepx- nee nJarbe sacTemyTO, TOJIOBBI h men y OJBIIHCTBa 3a- KYTaHEI. y 0JbIMHCTBa TpynOB 3ameTHBI eJbe IOBS3KM na JIeBOM pykase naJbTO c BbIIIIMTBIMM WJIM HapvcOBaHHBIMM na hhx 3B3gaMM asuga. Ha HeKOTOpbIX Tpynax — necTpan, apkan ogenga, kaky1o obIMHO HOCHT Ibrane. IIpeouagalr B OCHOBHOM TPYIEI AeHIMH H gere pasy- HHX B03paCT0B. Kpamaropcka, no IIIKOJIbHo yuve, npoTiiB Kya mm. JIeHuHa, bo Bope ycabbI, aamiMaBnieliCH recTano, oGnapyiKenu Be 3aKpbITbIe hmm, ogHa — Meatfly yopno# n nomoHo Amo, xpyran — B HeCKOJIBKMX Merpax ot Hee; oe HMM pacnouararTcn BO3Je orpaBI, npvueraronei K IIIKOJIBHo yuue. B IepBo hmc iia rrynne 2 MeTpoB ot MOBepXHOCTM oGnapyateHO 5 TpynoB, M3 mix Ba ReTCKMX b Bo3pacre ot 8 0 11 eT H Tpu eHCKMX. TpynM b iiCTJieBineii BMMHe ogenge, IIOUTM JIMIIIeHbI MHrKMX TKanei. y flByx TpynoB (IKeHMMHBI n peGemta) IOBpezgeHM koCrei He oGnapyateHO. Bo Bropoi hmc oHapyero 7 MY-KCKMX TpynoB, OgeTbIX b CrenOBRM 11 KOCTIOMEI, yflOBJieTBopiiTejibiio coxpaHMBmIMeCA. B xapmarax ogeHCIBI hh- vero He oGiiapyateno. TpyuHbe M3MeneHMS pa3BMTEI 3HayMTeJIEHO — y Bcex MMeJIIICb CKBO3Hbie nyJeBbe paHeHMH vepena, HHeHTMHHbe IOBpengeHMIM, Bbime OncaHHEIM. B flByx spax — y cena EpacHOropEM, b yacru, oGpamennoli k Iocceno flopore, nxye ot Kpamaropcka na KonCraH- TIIHOBKy, B mracrax 113 TIHEI 11 3eMJIM ouapyKeHBI TpynM, vacTu KOTOpMX BbIcTyIaJIM Ha nOBepXHOCTb, OTgeJBHbe KOCTII, KOHeHHOCTH H vepena Jexas Ha Tpase B HeKOTOpOM orgaJeHKM (15—30 MeTpoB) ot OBpara. IIpn packorke B noBepxnocTHMx CJIOHX oHapyeHBI Tpynu, MOTH JIMIHHbe MSrKMX Tkare II B MCTIeBIIei 3MMHei ogerge. Cpegu TpynoB onapyeHEI npeMeTBI oMalHero onxoga (nocyfla, qaiHMKVI, HOIM, biijikh, 3epkaJo h np.). CI N 8, qarpoBaHHOMy — «BepH, 1 < M1OJIH 1941 ro,a», KOTopb nOA BIIOM «ubrpanuw rpak- AaHCKMX JIHI n 1O03pMTeJIBHbIX BOeHHOIIIeHHbIX, 3axsaveHHbIX B BOCTOUHOM noxoge», yka3bBaer, yrO «ocoas ocTaHOBKa BOCToVHoro noxoga Tpeyer ocobIX mep, KOTOpue A0KHb IIpOBOAIITBCS 1OA coCTBeHHy1O OrBeTCTBeH- HOCTb, BHe KaKux-JIHo 6ropokparuyeCKMX M aMMHMCTpaTMBHLIX BJIMHHMM». B pa3BiiTiie aro XrpeETIIBL oncpaTiiBiian komanga H/o 1O. .inmin esonacHOcTII II CII yrovser: «B nouite Kazkyoro mcc Him Hcoxo/uMo npexcraBJISITE cio- na oTr o nenTreIbHOCTII KOMalX CI b cranouapHbIx rarepsx BoeHuoneHIHX. Heoxo4IIMo yka3bBaTb IO.IIIHCCTBO JIMEBII- Aalu no Haliloia.IIOcTaM, B COOTBCTCTBIIII c IEB3JIOSKEHHLIMI b iiHCTpyKmmx peKTIIBaMI». 0 TOM, Kak BCO BbIIeyKa3aHHLe AHpeKTIIHH BLITIOJTIISIJIIICL, roBopiiT qoneceHne onepaTHBHoM KOMaHXW 7 (ofiepiiiTypMoaii- opepa JIuuepa puraupiopepy «01ropy» Tonacy) b BHHIIe ot 4 Aekapn 1941 r. B 3TOM xoHeceHIIII ykazbBaerE, «rro b ra- repe B BuHHIIe, nocle Tak Ha3bBaemoi «oirrpau sxareps, ocTaJoch Bcero 25 veJOBeK, KOTopue moran 6bITB oraecenB k kare- ropui «10103pIITeJIbHHX». 6Jro orpauuveuuoe KO.lIiqOCTBO, — ronopirres B XOHecelMII, — obacnaerea TOM, VTO MeCTHbe opranu noBceAHeBHO mpepnpuAI- MaJIM HeoXOAMMbe MeponpuaTIs no auII noII esoma- CHocTn lipOTIIB orpiareJbHbIX 3JTeMeHTOB B craioxapHLIX arepax BOeHHOIIIEHHHIX B EOHTaKre C koMeHaHraMM II1 COOTBETCTBYIOIIUIIMII odnepaMI kouTppa3BeXKI». TakuM opa3oM, IIOMIIMO MaccoBbIX kaznei, npoBopIIBIIIIXeS cuenuaJbHo co3aHHbMII AIN aroro «ongepkoMaugaMI», unt- PoKO upakTIIKoBa.IOCb CIlCTeMilTIIieCKOP nerpexenxe COBerEEIIX no/e koMenAaHTaMI 11 uaxoanMueS B 11X nogyMHeHMII ROMaH- AaMr arepeii IS COBCTCK1IX BOOHHOIIJTEHHLIX. 5. B uUX neuu npezapureBnO orupauu TpyxOCTOCOHETX NYUME, weaua z xere CEue 1 3-th xeruero Bo3pacra u oTITpaBJsJ Ha xarop cHLe paoTH B TepuaHMw, OCTNIB HLX xore H uerpyrococoHuX napocaux mnpanas F FOHTeH- ' TpaioHHHe mnrepu y tepomuoro kpas 060poHE, B nepnox c 9-ro no 13-e aapra 1944 roma rureporIE nos YCweHHEI somoel CC k oxpauno noumua coruaun b xa- repu B pafone uecreka Osapuu xecsTEW THCH COBeTCKVX Jvoje# 3 nepecHJOUHK IyHKTOB, pacnoxozeHEL B paouax cramu# Pynoeka, Pakop, Crapyuna, Kpacuu eper v ua- cexeHHsx TTyHKTOB MIWKyJb-Toponox, nopocanue, LlezpegeBKA, " I: uapra 194 roma Ha paCCBGTC, - coommua yTeJB- HwIa E.Ma3, - HaC, ureue ropoma M0Ma, nenu coruaxv 3a JMVHUID zeue3no qoporu , k 3zaHm MIKOJH. 3zecB OEV oTopaJM Bcex TpyxocnocouLX, a ocraBuxCS crapMKOB, xe- re M zeamME norpy3nau p uexoH no 60-70 venoseK b x0J01- nue, ueorariupaemue BaroHL, B MCKJIDUMTEJIBHO TSEtOJIEK auru- cauurapuuX ycnorusx, B xonoze M rpnau HOC xonesn n0 CTaHLMM Pakop M noruauuu E xareps, pacnoxoreuuu# B 3-x xa- uoMrpax ot craauH. Or kouona M roxoxa MHoro xore 3nnopa- A 080079 -------------------------------------------. "rIUINI -D- H1473 - 0079 jio M YMOpJO b BarOHX, MHOTO norwJjio CTapKKOB, xeHIUH V nere no nopore b uareps". OcBoozgeHHaH M3 uarepa Jl.llerapckas coomma Koiuc- Cuw: "12 uapra 1944 roma non Bevep uac, xurexe ropoxa Nouu, 3ac‘al MJIM coup arbCa B reveune noxyyaca Ha crauIII moMH-Duas. 3ueCb HeHH oropauu MoJO1HX u yBexu uk. BaruaF uac B renyux, ueuu unruyxo 3aEpuJIM mepu. Kyxa unC B03YT, MU HO BHaJIM, HO Bce npenyBCTBonaJIU negopoe, Kax nOTOL Or3NOCb, hoc Be3uH no PynoeJF OEcxo BeTEe m pasrpy3uun Ox Beep 15 uapra. HobI no koeHO B aunTKo# rpnan Hac norHau b uarepb. 13 roro uareps uac neperuauu bo BropoD. B xopore HOMIH 6uJM uac, oTCTaBaBuVX paccrpe- JaJV, Bot uger meHuna e rpens neTbuM. Onuu uauuu ynau, ueMTH crpeJDr b Hero. Korma xe Marb m zoe ee qerew b ynace 05opaBarTcs , counaTH-3Bep nooepexHO crpeJSDT M B HMX. Marb noxHMiaer UcrOuHuR Kpuk,u TOT KpuK opu- BaeTCS BLCTpeJOM B ynop. Huy’r Marb M CHH BouzapeBE. Pee- HOK ue BIep aji yrouureJbuoro nyru M ynau. Marb HaKJO- HSeTCS Han uMM, ona xoveT yTeLMTb ero CJOBOM, HO HW CHH, HK MaTb 6oJbue HO BcraJIM, He ypuxeu roxyoro aea -ueu- qu 3acrpexnuu ux". Jlecoras A.V. 1a cexa M axeixas Pyxus coomuna: ” B nyTu CJeZOBHNH B repb rpyuna ycranux COBOTCEMK xDoz,e npucexa OTIOXHYTB, Tecranore, KOHFOMpOBEuM uac, uarpa- BMJI coax, Korop we CWJIbHO uckyceuu KEUTKOBCKy v xpyrvx". Ha OCHOBaHVM TMx MarepvaJoB HpesBHaHAS Tocy apCTBeHHaS KOMMCCWS YCTaHOBWJ8: OceHBD 1941 roxa nemenko-amnercxwe aaxBaTVKV OKKyMpOBa- JIV ropox Cxasyry n opraHM3OBaJV B HeM IUIS paHeHHX w OJIBHNX owepoB w onOB Kpackol ApMMW "resaper", HaWMeHOBEB ero: "Tpocc-aaaper" Cxasyra, ma xerepb 301". "Jazaper" u pacno- xoweH b noJryropaByx xMrOMeTpax pro-BocroHee CJaBYTN n 3aHK- A MaI ieCsTB rpexaraxHux KaMeHHTX 3qany-JOKOB. Bee 31aHVH rVT- xteDoBrE oxecJ rycroll ceTbD mpoBoJOvHEX 3arpaweHM. BnoJTb 3arpaxzenvi, vepes xexxe 10 MeTpOB u nocrpoeHH BEIKM, nn xoropux HaXOIMJITICB nyxremeTH, npoverropa n oxpara. AJMMHveTparMS, Hemenxne Bpavx M oxpaHa "Tpocc-Jaaapera" b ywze xomennaHra raynrmana Ixrank, 3areM cmeHmBmero ero mahopa TTanuvcra, aameCTTCJIS xomenxaHra raynrana Kpoucop ep, raynT- vena Hoe, mracaprra oxropa Eope, ero 3aMecTureJIS 10Kropa IypM, odep-esbg*eeus VbseMaH n eJbxeeas Eexkep — npoBO- xnw maccosoe werpexenwe coseTCKiix BHHOnTeHHNX nyTeM co318- v cneruansnoro pexva roxoga, CkyeHHOCTV M aH’TMCAHVTapWW,H1473 -0093 IIpMMeHeHMH IETOK H IIpKMEX yKcTB, JIMIEHN OJbHNX K PaHeHNX xeyeHxs IT MpwHyKKEHWS kpaline WcTOmeHHNX JrgeN K KarOpKHOVy rpyny. 38DeTCMePTM• 3 "Tpoccxasapere" Hemerkwe BTaCTM cocpeOTOVVBaJV 15-18 THCS raxeJO H xrerko paHeHHX, 0 TaKxe crpa T8DLUX pasJnv- VHeKIOHHHMM z nevHeKIMOHMHMW 3a0eBaHVSMM COBeTCKWX soewonJeHHuX. MccuregoBaune 6 TpynoB 113 96 noKaaano nauuuue OCTPbIX uHeK- IMOHHBIX 3aoeBanxi: b OAHOM cuyyae fipioiniioro rua (rpyn N» 144 ii3 MOrMJIBI N» 624), b 4-x cuyvasx A3BeHHb ii quyrepnruvecKM EOJIIIT, xaparrepHB WIS A3eHrepuI b conyTCTBnii c ncroneHMeM (Tpynb NN 568 ii 569 H3 MOrHJIBI N» 640 ii NeN 273 n 274 13 MOrIJIBI N 630), b OHOM cuyvae xaparrep ocTporo MHeKIUIOHHoro 3a6ojieBaHHfl ycra- HOBJIeH ne bLI (rpyn N 265 H3 MOrHJbI N» 630) (cm. npnurokeune N? 6). IIpn BCEPBITIM 22 ii napyKHOM ocMOTpe 35 TpynoB bLJII oGnapysKenu TSkeJIbe nOBpeKeHMS BoeHHoro xapaKTepa, npu oJblei vacTH hx Ha Tpynax HaxoMJIIICB OcTaTKM nepeBH30VHoro Marepnasa n ihiih, to npo- BOJIOVHBIX, to gepeBSHHBIX. M3 ykazaHHIbIX nOBperkgeHM 10: paneHM vepena ii roJOBHoro Mora — 1, TpaBMaruyecrOe pasppoueune veJIOCTM — 1, paneHwe pimko IIOJIOCTH c IOBpenkgeHneM IIOVKM — 1, npo- HMkalolee panenne IIOJIOCTM Tana — 2, mpoHMKaxonee panenne rpyquo KJIeTKM —11, paneHM HMKHHX EOHevHOCre c EOCTHBIMM IOBpenge- HMSIMM — 36, panenw BepxHMX xOHevHocre c kocthumii IOBpeKgeHMSMM — 5. Mroro MOpBeprHyTO cyqeHO-MeMIMIHCKOMy uccJegOBaHMIO — 57 TpynoB c ornecrpeJBHBIMM noBpeageHMSMM (BoeHHas TpaBMa) (cm. npu- J103KeHMS NN 5, 13, 14 ii 15). IIpn nccJIeOBaHMI ykazaHIbIx TpynoB EOHCraTIpOBaHO: Bee Tpynu, 3a MCKnoveHMeM JIMIIIB OAIHOVHBIX, npegcTaBJISIII xapTHHy Epanero ucrOIeHMS. Panu MSrEMX TKanei (koikii, Mump, ac) c pBaHbIMI EpasMI M JiocKyToo6pa3iiUMii IIOBepXHOCTAMM, c oGhjilhum thohuum IpomTbI- BanneM, 3axoaM gaeko 3a mpegeJBI paneBoro paapymcHiiH. IIo- BpesgeHne kocre IOVTI 6e3 npii3naKOB (JiopMiipoBaHim Moaojieft, c 0JBMIM EOJIMYeCTBOM KpyIHBIX ii MeJIEHX EOCTHBIX OCEOJIKOB. IIocue- Hue c ocTpuMii, 3yvaTbIMM, GyrpncTHMii KpasMI h HepoBHBIMM 110- BepxHOCTAMM. Ohii MJII CB0OHO II3BJIeKaIOTCS H3 panu, iijih CBS3aHBI MeKy coo MSrKIIMI TEaHSMM II KOCTHUMII neperIagMHaMI. OuapykeHO pa KYJIbre HMKHMX KOHeHHOCTeft (expa ll roJeHM). ToJbEO vacTb HX nMeJa BIX amnyTaloHHEIX KYJIBrei, B 60JIbMIHHICTBe OHII mpegcTaBJIHJIM BMA TpaBMarnyeCEo amnyranun EOHevHOCre. B TOM ii xpyrom cuyvae MarKHe TKaHI pBaHbe. B amnyTaIoHHBIX KYJIBTAX OTpe30K KOCTH BbIcTyIaeT na 10—15 Hag IIOBepxHOCTBIO pacmaBJISIOIIIMXCH, 3iocKyToo6pa3HUX MarKIX TEane. Ha HeKOTOpBIX RYJBTAX — MHorOWMCJIeHHbe KOCTHMC dparMeHTBI, CBS3aHHbe C IeH- rpaJbHBIM OTpe.3KOM EOCTI JIMIIIB MSTRMMM TKaHSMI (cm. npuOkeHIS NN 5, 13, 14, 15). OnucanHoe cocroSHwe paHeBBIX IOBepxHocre yKaau- BaeT Ha to, VTO nocJepune ne noBepracb xupypruvecro opaorke. B HeKOTOPbIX mornJax oxee aBHero 3axoponeHa (MOrMJIBI NeN1, 25 ii Ap.), b EOTOPBIX Tpynu HaxoMJIMICB b COcTOSHIII qaJerO 3amex- mero paajiOHceHHM c pacmaOM MSITEIIX TEane n pasbeMHeHMI Eocre — bIJIM TaEe uaeHbI ocTaTKii MapJI ii niiiii (cm. mpMJTOSReHMS NN 1 ii 2). CygeHO-MeAMIMIHCKMM necJeOBaHleM 6 TpynoB in omero uuCJIa bckputux bIIO ycraHOBJIeHO Hauuywe pa3HbIX 3a6ojieBaHiiii, Kar-TO: aciecc npaBoro erkoro (rpyn N 230 M3 MOTMJIBI J 629), nopoK cepgxa (rpyn N» 535 H3 MOrHJIBI N» 639), karappaJbkas IIHeBMOHMS npasoro uerkoro (rpyn N? 270 in MOrHJIBI N» 630), cencnc (rpyn N 271 M3 MOrMJIBI N 630), $n6pHHO3Huii npaBOCTopoHHiiii IIeBpIIT c HauvweM eJTTYXK, MOBMAMMOMy, cenruveckoro mponcxoxgenN (rpyn Ne 272 13 MOrMJIBI N 630), $ii6piiH03H0-rH0Hiiuii ITeBpIT npu Ha.uuHI omero ucroIeHMS (rpyn No 276 H3 MOrMJIBI N» 630). B HerOrOpbIX cuyvaax ycraHOBMTB npuuuny CMepTM ne mpepcTaBIJIOCb BO3MOSKIIBIM aa OTcyTCTBIeM HBHUX narouoruyecKMX ii3MeiiCHiiH ii EakIX-JIIo OBpesgeHM npu HauuuIM 3HauTeJIBHBIX rHMJIOCTHEIX ABJeHI, npennTCTByiomiix yeTaHOBJIeHMIO warHo3a o npnuuue cMepni (Tpynu N M3 MOTMJIBI N»635, N H3 MOrMJTBI N 630 ii N.N 571 ii 572 13 MOrMJIBI N 640) (cm. npuJOke- nue N» 9). B 4-x cuyvasx H3 omero EoJIIeCTBa BCEPBITBIX TpynoB bLI ycra- HOBJeH arT 3axoponeHS 9KIIBUMII, npu HOM B 3-X cuyvasx npu BCKpbl- TIM TpynoB Gujio onapyxeHO Epanee ucroIeHwe, a b 4-m Hapsxy c ncromeHMeM MMeJIOCB ene KaKoe-To ocTpoe nHerIMOHHoe 3aoxesanve (rpyn No 145 M3 MOrMJIbI N» 624). akT 3axoponeHMs whbmmii IIOJ- TBepagaereH oGiiapyjKenneM b ryokMX AbIxaTeJIBHBIX IIyTAX, BIIIOTB g0 MCJibuaiinnix poHXOB, OJIbloro xcoJIIIVeCTBa necMHOE (Tpynu N« 145 113 MOrIJIBI N 624, N.N 494 ii 496 H3 MOrIJIBI N h N573 113 MO- No 625 — 21, Ns 630 — 24, N. 635 — 31, N» 628 — 20, No 633 — 33, N» 638 —39, N» 641 — 1, tskhm o6pa3OM WII HcCJIeOBaHMH Gujio H3BJeveHO 587 TpynoB (cm. npo- TOKOJIBI MCCJIeOBaHMS). OcMOTp OcTaJbHBIX paCKpUTUX MOTMJI gaer OCHOBaHne CUMTaTb, HTO b hiix IMeITCA Tpynu b KOJiiwecTBe, HaxoqaeMcs b mpegeJax ot 18 10 39 TpynoB b kango aa HCknoveHMeM MOrMJIBI N226, b Eoropo koJIyeCTBO TpynoB 3HaMreJIBHO oJbIIIee. M3 587 HBBJeMeHHBIX TpynoB 112 blIM IOBeprHYTBI cyqeHO- MeAMIIHCEOMy BCKpUTIIIO, OCTaJIMIHM >KC 475 6blJI mpomsBegeH OCMOTp. IIpn cyxeHO-MeAMIMIHCKOM BCKpUTIIII TpynoB B OCHOBHOM, 3a IC- koyeHMeM OTeJIBHBIX cuyyaeB, 6b110 ycraHOBJIeHO Hauuue ucroleHHH, kapTMHa ero bxa KoncTaTiipoBana b 96 cuyvanx, npu veM npu uccJIe0- BaHMM 31 Tpyna xpome SBek ucrOIeHMH hhkbkhx pyrux IaroJorH- yecKMX nponeccoB b opraiiax h TKanaX ycraHOBJIeHO ne bIIO. B 3THX curyyasx npii HapyHOM OCMOTpe ycranaBJIMBaJIIICb OTeTIMBO BU- paskeHHBe KOCTHue BUCTynu na TYJIOBuIe c pe3KMM ucTOHueueM KoHev- kocrek H yerKO oGpHCOBaHHUMii BucTynaMii covreHeHM npu OTcyTCTBim nOBpesxgenw ii cJegOB Hacu.Ia. Hpii BuyrpeHHeM nccJIeOBaHlH ycMa- rpuBaJOCB nOJIHoe oGea/KiipiiBamie IORKONKHo EIeTaTKH, caJbHHKa 11 6pbKeek. Cepune 6B1O aumeno iKiipoBoii oKJIaKM c npii3HaKaMii cSiancroro ee nepeposgeHMS, noyevHas Kancyua TaKke IIIeHa kupa. Bee EuyrpenHue opraHb yMeHbIIIeHBI b pasmepax. Taras xapruua c He3HaMIITeJIBHbIMII BapnanIsMH ycmarpuBaacb npu uccregOBaHMII curepyxonX TpynoB: N128—135 na MorWJIb N 624, NN 146—153 H3 MOrMJIBI N» 625, N 231 na MOrMJIBI N 629, JNN 267 n 268 113 MOrRJbI Ns 630, NN 342 ii 343 113 MOrMJIBI N»633, JNN 412— 416 13 MOrIBI Ns 635, N» 497 na MOrHJIBI N 638 n NN 555-558 113 mohijiu N 640 (cm. mpurozeuwe N 3). Hpii MccSeXOBaHMM 24 TpynoB 113 96 Hapsy c pe3KMM ncroneHHeM 651310 okapykeHO nasuwe ryepryuesa JerKuX b pa3JIMHbIX covera- Bee HapMorIIbHbe XOJIMBI pacnoJoceHBI mpaBMJIBHLIMW psxavv, npu HeM b nepBux 22 paax HMeeTCH no 25 HaMOrMJIBHBIX XOJIMOB BRaskOM, aa HCKoveHMeM 10, 17 ii 21 pa^oB, b KOrOpBIX rosuyecrBO xojimob AHoe, a IIMeHHO: B 10-23 ii b 17 ii 21 no 24. B 23, 24 n 25 pspax no 26 XOJIMOB B Ka3K/OM II B 26 PSy HMeeTCH 15 XOJIMOB ii 10 OTKpUTUX HM, 113 EOTOPbIX ABe, Haxopamuecs pagoM C MIOCJIeHMM HaMOrMSIBHBIM Xo-MOM, HacTHHO upuCbilaHbI necKOM. B nocJegHeM, 27 paxy nMeerca 25 OTKPbTbIX HM, Be 113 KOTOpUX, naxogsmxecs y KOHIa roro paga, Tawike HacTIHHO upucbilaHbI necKOM. Bee HaAMOrMJIBHBe XOJIMBI vMerr OAHAKOBY1O opMy B BuAe veTbpexcrarno Kpunill II OH II TOT ke pa3Mep okojio 2,5 x 1,8 mt. no OCHOBaHMIO h TOJIBEO OHMH XOJM b 10-m PHAY Ha, Morno N» 226 nMeer dopmy yceveHHo# mupaMMBI ii pasmep ero 3HaureJIbHO 6oJIbIIIM, a MMeHHO 6 x 1,8 mt. onee KOJIMyeCTBO HaAMOrHJIBHBIX xojimob — 639. M3 ykasauHoro vucJa MOrMJI Gujio pacnpuTo 38, OTMeyeHHBIX na cxeme JNNe 1, 25, 146, 208, 226, 310, 323, 373, 374, 384, 422, 423, 465, 472, 473, 521, 522, 526, 572, 573 ii ot 622 x0 639 BRIOVIITeJIBHO. Ilo pac- KPblTMI MorMI ycraHaBJIMBaeTCA, rO pasmep HX mpeBbaer pazmep HaMOrJIbHBIX XOJIMOB II paBHSeTCS B cpegnem 3 X 2 MT. VckoyeHWe cOCTaBJISeT mormJa N» 226, pasmep kOropo 8x3 mt. OpanaeT Ha ces ocooe BHMMaHMe OAMH Tpyn H3 2- MOrMJIBI BTO- poro paa (Tpyn N 694), Ha mpaso HMSKHe KOHeVHOCTM KOToporo Ha30- keHa IIpOBOJIOHHas IIMHa. n P H OCMOTpe 3geCb bIJI ouapykeH nepeom B HMKHe Tper expa, KOHHU IeHrpaJbkoro II nepucepnqecroro OT- JIOMKOB expa MMerT MHorovncJeHHbe KOCTHae OCKOJIKM, C OCTpaMII kpanMM, Mexxy coo He CBH3aHHbe ii MOABMSKHbe. Ha xpyrom Tpyne M3 7-fi MOrMJIbI ot EOHIa paga (Tpyn J 708) na JeBOM expe onapykena MapueBas IIOBA3Ka, noA koropo OTMealres JamnacHbe paspe3b (cm. IIpHJI. NN 19 ii 20). IV. Mecro 3axoponeHMa y BoqoHanopuo amHw (obeKT N4) Ha paccTosHII 100 MCTpOB OT BogoHanopno amHv na XOJIMWCro MecTHOCTH pacnoJokeHO e3 karoro-Io nopapka 11 HaMOrMJIBHBIX XOJIMOB (cm. cxemy). Ha HeEOTOPBIX mormJax XOJIMBI BO3BEIIIaIOTCS q0- BOJIBHO 3HaunreJIBHO, Ha xpyrux epBa BbICTyIIalOT HaA IOBepXHOCTBIO 3eMJIM. Bee HaMOrMJIBHbe XOJIMBI IIOKPBITBI HM3KopocJo rpaBo. OAH M3 XOJIMOB (mormJIa N 7) coxpaHMJICS HanoJOBMHy, Tar KaK B opHo ero IIOJIOBHHe MMeeTeH BOpOHEoopasnoe yrjiy6jieniie, opasoBaBIeecs, bm- AMO, b pesyJbrare nonagaHIN cxoga cHapsga. IIoBepxHOCTB BOpOHKI IIOKpbIra rjiiinncTO-necHanbiM rpyHTOM. PasmepbI HaAMOrMJIBHBIX XOJI- mob pa3HbI n mpeAcTaBJISIOTCA b curexyomx nucpax: N1 — 4 x 2,5, N 2 — 8 x 2,5, N 3 — 5 x 2, N 4 — 8 x 2,5, N 5 — 8 x 2,5, N 6 — 8x2, N 7 — 8 x 2, N 8 — 8 x 2, N 9 — 9 x 2, N 10 — 8 x 2 11 N 11 — 5 x 2 m. M3 yka3aHHbIX 11 MOrMJ 1310 pacKpBITO 3 3a NeN 4, 6 ii 11. Hpii pacKpBITMI MorMI ycraHOBJTeH BJIaKHB rjiiimiCTO-nec'iaHbiii rpyHT. Bo Bcex pacKpbITBIX moruax onapykeHbI IIOTHO xpyr okojio xpyra, pagamM, Jencanme TPynBI. B 4-ii mornue pacnoroseune TpynoB Tpexcuonoe, b 6- H 11-fl OpHocJonoe. PapbI TpynoB JeaT TaKiiM opasom: BepxHAA nOJIOBIIHa TYJIOBMIa, opaneHHas K OpHOMy 113 KOpOTKIIX EpaeB MOrMJIBI (ee nomepeHMK) pacnoaraeres na HIHel nojioBinie Tpyna, xenamero JMke k nocuepHemy (cm. npiui. N 21, obeKT N 4, morma N 4). VCkIO- veuve 113 roro pacnoJokeHMS TpynoB papamu mpegcraBJISeT co6oio JIMIIIb IOKHas veTBepTb 4-ii MOrMJIbI, rge TpymbI HaJokeHBI HaBaJOM. Bee Tpyna bo bccx pacEpbITBIX moruuax JenaT 3aTbLJIKOM KBepxy 11 napa.- JleJIBHO k AIMHHMKy MOrMJIBI. Hacro OTKPbIBaIOTCH koHroMepaTbI TpynoB, b EOTOPbIX k Tpyny ZkeHIIMHBI IIJIOTHO IIpMKaTBI OAMH MJIM HeCEOJIBKO TpyniiKOB AeTCKMX, MHorga pynn SkeHCRoro Tpyna oHMMaIOT TYJIOBMme geTCEoro TpynMKa. KoJveCTBO HaxogamuXCH b moruax TpynoB — b moruue N 4 He Menee 350—380, b mornje X? 6 0 200 11 b mornue N 11 ne MeHbme 150—180. M3 MOrMJIBI N 4 M3BJeveHO 107 TpynoB (NN 718—824), 113 11 — 77 TpynoB (NN 825—901). M3 MOrHJIBI N6 M3BJeveHwe TpynoB ne npom3BOAMJIOCb 11 uccJegOBaHne 23 TpynoB (NN 902—924) 6b1J10 npon3- BegeHO na mecre. Bee Tpyna bLII b COCTOSHMM 3KMpOBOCka. OgeKBI Ha Tpynax ne 6bLJ10; JIMIIb Ha OAMHOVHbIX MMeITCS OTgeJIbHbe yacTM HOCMJIbHoro eJbA. Ha HeCEOJIBKMX rojioBax 3eHCKMX TpynoB onapykeHbI HJiaTKII. 3 M3BJIeVeHHBIX H3 4-ii 11 11 MoriiJi TpynoB — npuuapJekaJM keHIIMHaM — 101, AeTAM — 81, MyKUMHaM — 2. erabhOMy nccJIeOBaHMIO nOBeprICb Tpyna b 78 cuyyaax M3 MoniJia N 4, b 23 cuyyasx 113 MOrMJIb N6M b 77 cuyvasx 13 MoniJia N11. Hpn 3tom Ora3aJOcb, TO orHecrpebHbe IIOBpegeHMS rojioBa OTcyrcTByioT Bcero JIMIIIb b HeCKOJIBKMX cuyvaax. B nogaBaomeM 60Jb- MIMHCTBe ycMarpuBaJMCb rpyble IIOBpeKgeHMS kocre vepena 11 Eocre aIwIeBorO ckeera. O6BIMHbe pasmepbI BXOHoro OTBepCTMH — 0,7—0,8 cm. HacTbIO MHOSKeCTBeHHbe paneHMS rojioBa c 2—3 h 4-MS BXO HBIMM OTBepCTMSIMM. IIovTM IIOCTOSHHO na Mecre BaxoAHoro OTBepCTHI Mnoro- n KpyiHOOCKOSIBMaTbe mepeJoMBI KOCTeii. Tarne ake nepejiOMa Eocre nepeAKO 11 na Mecre exoahobo OTBepCTMS. CpaBHMTeJIBHO HepepKO BeTpe- yalorcs TpenHBI h paspymeHMS KOCTeii OCHOBaHMS vepema. Hro Eacaercs JTOkaJM3anMM BxoAiioro 11 BaxoAHoro OTBepeT Bee MCCHIeZOBaHHbe rojioBa MoryT 6bITb pacnpegeJeHBI no cJIeAYIOmMM rpynnam: 1. BxoAHoe OTBepcTne b vemye 3aTblIOHo kocth, BbIXOHHIbe OT- BepCTHS — B nepeguMX orgeJax yepena II B Tex IIJIH xpyrux oxacrax IMIeBorO CKCJICTa, vemys J10Ho KOCTH, HapyKHas CTCHKa ra3HMIbI, CKyJIOBas KOCTb, BepxHHA veJOCTb. Kar BapuaHT roro Tima MoryT bITb YIOMHHYTBI cuyvan, B KOTOpaX BXOAHOC OTBepcrwe pacnoaraJocb b oJacT oJIbmo aaTbiJioHiioii bIpbI 11 MMeJIMCB paspymeHIS ee EpaeB. 2. Cuyuan e BXOAHBIM OTBepcreM b oSjiacTii l-ro meinoro IO3BOHKa n BBIXOAHBIMM OTBepCTMSMM b rex ae oJacTax, TO h b nepBo rpynne iijiii ke HaxoSIMMMCS b Jioono-BiicoHnax 11 TeMSHHO-BMCOVHbIX oJTacTax rojioBa. 3. Hepena c BXOAHaMii OTBepCTIAMM na ro iijiii xpyro OKOBo cropone Hepena 11 BBIXOAHBIMM OTBepCTMAMM ha npoTHBonojiojKiioii cropoHe. B 3tiix cuyvasx — rpy6ae MHOrOOCEOJILuarbe paapymenna EpBIIIIKM Hepena — IOVTH KaE mpaBMJIO. 4. HeoJbmoe UHCJIO vepenoB C BXOAHaMii OTBepCTHAMI c reM ace pacnoJokeHMeM, hto b mepBo m bo Bropo rpynnax, H BBIXOAHBIMM OTBepCTMSMII B JIoGnO-BMCOHHOft IIJIII TCMHHHO-BIICOHHOii oJacTaX. 5. HecEOJIBEO vepenoB, vane eTCKMX, mpecTaBJIMIOT KapTiiHy IIOJI- noro paspyeHMS, e MHOrOOCKOJILVaTBIMM mepeoMaMM 11 pasbeMHeHHBIMM EOCTHbIMM parmeHraMM. HeoxoMMO OTMeTHTb, HTO Hapaxy C OnilCaHHHMII nOBpeKeHMHMM na OTeJIBHBIX vepenax Haunune KaKiix-Jiii6o nOBpeskeHI ycraHOBJIeHO ne 6ajio. V. MecTO 3axoponeHMa nepex mecTMM KopnycoM (obeKT N5) Ha paccTOsHMM 52 MeTpoB ot xoro-3anaguoro yrua 6-ro Kopnyca n b 50 Merpax ot inocceiiHoii qoporn oHapykeHO MecTO 3axopoHeHMS e3 HaAMornjiBHoro xojiMa. Baojib mecra 3axoponeHMS 11 HemocpecTBeHHO HaA hum na paccrosHMI oHoro merpa ot IpoBOJIOVHoro 3arpankgeHMS npoxoAHT nemexopuas opoKEa, 3acbnaHHas necKOM n oJ0keHHas co CTOpOHa mpoBoJOVHoro 3arpaikgeHMS oJOMKaMM EaMHS. Paom C 3TMM MecTOM 11 3a hum nocaieHbI MOJioAae epe3oBbe gepeBbA. IIoBepxHOCTB Mecra 3axopoHeHMS HueM He oTuaeTCS ot OKpyiKaioineii noBepxuocTii 3eMJIM. Hpn pa3pbITMM rpyma b stom Mecre onapykena mornJa pasmepom 4,5 x 3 mt. ; na ryMHe 30 cm. ot noBepxHOCTii 3eMJIM onapykeHo oJbloe EoJIMMeCTBO KOCTeii, npii yeM OTeJBHbe kocth BepxHMX h HMKHMX KOHeHHOCTeii 6BLIV noKpaTa OcTaTRaMM, MOBMAMMOMy, HareJb- noro eJbS, 3HauTeJIBHO nereBlero 11 erEO pBymeroca. Hpn aJb- neiimeM pacKpaTim MoniJia b He oSHapysKeiio 60Jbloe EoJIIVeCTBO M30JIMpOBaHHbIX vepenOB, a Takke CBOOHO pazgeJaBIIIMXCA vacre TpynoB. HoBpesKAeHiiii na TMX yacrax TpynoB, kaE n na yepenax ycra- HOBJIeHO ne 6bIJIO. Cpepu KOCTeii n vacre TpynoB bLII onapyeHbI OcTaTEM KOSKaHbIX eanor c MCTJIeBIIIIMM Eep3OBbIMH roureHMIIaMM c MeJI- kiimii EOCTAMM cTon b mix. Bee kocth, Hepena 11 vacTH TpynoB HaxoNTCH b moruue b fiecnopHAOHHOM COcTOSHMM. VI. MecTO saxoponeHMa na cesep ot BogoHanopnoi amHn (obeKT N 6) Ha paccTOsHMH okojio 2-x kjim. na cesep ot BOAOHanopHoii anHu, b 150 Merpax ot MoJogoro XBokoro Jieca, y IOXOMIBBI necvanoro xojiMa onapykeno MecTO 3axoponeHMS b bhac TpaulIeM e3 iiacami, e nonepx- HOCTBIO, noKpaToii necKOM, hto He3HaMMTeJIBHO orJInaer ero ot Okpy- JKaionieii noBepxHOCTii, mpegcraBJImoIecH TaEEe necHanon, no MecraMI noKpaToii TpaBoii. B Tpex mecrax xoro-3anaquee 3Toii TpaHlllen MMeITCA ABa HeCKOJIBKO BO3BbIIaromXCH HaA IIOBepXHOCTBIO 3eMJIM xojiMa. Ha paccTOsHMM 10 MeTpoB ceBepo-BOCTOVHee yka3aHHbIX A B yx XOJIMOB onapykeHO Takke oaho MecTO 3axopoHeHMS 11 y cesepHo vacT rpaumen Oka3aJOCb eme ABa Mecra 3axopoHeHMS. locuepuve 2 Mecra 3axopoHeHMA HaMOrMJIBHbIX XOJIMOB He HMeIOT 11 IOBepXHOCTB IIX IIOVTM hiihcm He orIMaeTCS ot OKpyiKaioineii IOBepxHOCTM 3eMJII. Ho pacKpBITHM yka3aHHbIX MecT 3axoponeHMS Oka3aJIOcb, hto Tpanies, Hanomaxonas coo npOTIIBOTaHKOBaii POB, MMeer B AIMHy 65 MCTpOB n mpuHy 2,5 mt., pasmep OcTaJBHbIX MorM. cuexyion: 10 x 4 mt., 6x3 mt., 10 x 3 mt., 8 x 2 mt. ii 10 x 4 mt. Tpaumes Bajia pacKpaTa b 3-x Mecrax, a MMeHHO Konna ee (ceBepHb 11 I03KHB#) 11 cpeHAS nacTb. Pasmep OTKp aTax ynacTKOB 3x2 — 4 x 2 mt. KpoMe Toro 6bLIM pacnpaTa Be, yrasaHHbe BbIIe nOCJIeHMMM, MoniJia. Bo Bcex YIOMSHYTbIX pacKpbITBIX mecrax na ruynhe ot 60 cm. ao l merpa 6ajni onapykeHBI Tpyna, Jekanne HaBaJOM b IOJIHOM ecnopsgke c mepenreranMMea yacTAMM Teji, npn veM rojioBa MHorMX TpynoB JekaJIM BHM3y npn nOJIYCOrHyTOM noJOSkeHMM TYJIOBMIa 11 c ropualMM KBepxy HoraMii.H1473-0111 6 TpyHT B paspBITbIX mecrax BJIaKHE, rHMCTO-IecvaHb. M3 2-X yiacTKOB rpahmen 6bIJIO M3BJeveHO IH uccJIeOBaHMS 20 TPYIIOB M 5 vepenoB (NN 925—949), mpu yem 6b10 ycraHOBJIeHO, TO Bce TPYIIbI MyjKCKoro noua, pasJHbIX B03pacT0B; Bce ohm bIIM b oxekge, b Kap- manax Eoropo 6bII onapyeH pax AOKYMeHTOB (nacnopTa, BoeHHbe MJTeTBI) n pa3Hbe kapMaHHbe Ben — 3ankuraJku, kapanan, nopT- curapbI, qeHbrH n npov. Ipn napyHOM ocMOTpc TpynoB c acTHVHBIMM paspesaMu MarKMX TIOKpOBOB 6b110 ycraHOBJeHO, rO TEaHM TpynoB coxpaHMJIVCb b pas- aMVHo creneHM npn ome kapruHe BJIaHoro pazmarueHHH c opa3o- BaHweM IKHpOBOCEa. B HeKOTOpbIX Tpynax OTMevaJIC rHMJIOCTHEI pacna TEanek ii opraHOB c ooHamenncM ii acTMVHBIM pacnageunem kocre. Ha Tpynax M3 2-ro paspbroro yacTka rpanmen ABJeHMH TpyIIHoro pacnaja 6bLIM BbpakeHbI oxee pesko, c oroueuneM kocre h, b acTHOCTM, vepe- noB. B ogno M3 pacKpbITbIX MOrHJ acTM TpynoB npeCTaBJINJIIICB b Bue IOUTH IIOJIHOCTBIO oroJeHHBIX KocTeii, ogeka CrHMJIa ii BBIABJIHeTCS B Bnge xerropsynUIXCA OCTaTKOB. M3 ro MOrMJIBI AIH ucCJIeOBaHHH 1310 M3BJeveHO 7 vepenoB (NN 950—956). VccuegOBaHMeM 32 TpynoB M OTAeJBHBIX vepenoB M3 pacEpBITbIX MOrHJI 1310 ycraHOBJTeHO, rO b 13 cuyvasx MMeJIICb orHecrpeJbHbe paneHMH roJOBB c pacnoxokeuMeM BXOAHbIX OTBepcTiiii b 3aHuX orgeJax vepena, B 11 xpyrux cuyuasx MMeJIMICb 6oJblwe paspymeHHH vepenHbIX KOCTeft, xaronne OcHOBaHne npu3HaTb iix TaEe aa pe3yJbTaT orHecrpeJIBHBIX no- BpezgenM, B Tpex cuyvaax MMeJIM MCCTO orkecrpeBHbe paneHMI /KIIBOTa ii b OAHOM cuyyae BbcTpe 6mji Ipom3BegeH b oJacTb men cnpasa. B verbpex cuyyasx HaJMMA IIOBpengenM npn HapyKHOM ocMorpe TpynoB ycraHOBJIeHO He 6bL1O (cm. IIpMJI. N 22). VII. MecTO saxoponeHMA b aecy (3a goporo, ugyme b c. TamEn) (obeKT N 7) B ecy Ha paccTOsHMH 85 MOTpOB ot qoporu, ngyle H3 rop. Cuxasyra b c. Tamku, b 700 Merpax Ha lor ot 1-ro Kopnyca BoeHHoro ropopra h b 245 Merpax ot 1O3KHo CTOpoHbI MecTa MaccoBoro 3axoponeHHA (05- pkt N 1) b xbomhom kycrapHIke onapyeno 3 MecTa 3axoponenMS 6e3 HaMOrMJIBHBIX XOJIMOB, c poBiioii IIOBepXHOCTBIO, noKpbiTOii 3exeno rpa- Bo, novemy OHII MaJo oTJIIMaIOTCA OT oxpyaxome MOBepXHOCTH 3eMJIM. Ilpii pacKpBITIH iix pa3Mcp OrasaJcs curexyxom: 5,5x3 mt., 9x3 mt. ii 3x1,5 mt. Bropas moruxa pacnookena ot nepBOii na paccTOsHMM 13 MCTpoB na 3anax, a TpeTbS na paccTOsHMM 45 MerpoB 3anayuee BTO- poii. TpyHT MorMJ rjinniicTO-nec’iaHMii. TpynbI b TIX moruax bLII onapyeHBI na ruynne 30—60 cm. ot IIOBepXHOCTM 3eMJIII, JekaJIH ohii 6ccnopnflO’iHO, HaBaJIOM; 0Jbmas vacTb nx blIa b ogezkge, MeHbIas 6c3 nee. Ogesga Mano MCTeBmas, BJIaHas, IOKpBITa IJIeceHbIO. B KapManax OAeKb uMeJIIICb AOKYMeHTEI n paaBJIHbe Mekwe Bel. BoJBIIMHCTBO TpynoB JeHCEoro noJa, cpeA- mix xer ii c ceABIMM BoJocaMM, no ecTb rakie h TPYIIBI MY-KVMH. MabIeBBM JI. r. BonpocaMM, MIpMXOXMM K curegyxomM 3axnoHeHHSM: 1. B OAHOM II TOM ace JIOke HaxOMJIHICb OJIbHbe pa3IHbIMM MueKIMAMI II 3gopo- Bbe JIIOM. 6) 3aBIIMBJIeHHOCTb, rps3b n ykacaronas arrucanurapnas ocra- HOBKa. b) OTcyTCTBiie OTOILIeHMI B xOOuoe BpeMS roga. r) A6cojhotho Henpuroquoe IMTaHHe no EavecTBy: xIe c 64% npn- Mecbio xpeBeCHBIX OmJOE (cm. pe3ybTaTbI Jaoparopnoro uccJeg0- BaHMSI, t. I ji. A- 139), auanga H3 ruuIoro kaproheus c npiiMCCbio orpo- cob, KpBICMHBIX xcrpemeHTOB ii t. n. A) arruecIcoe OTCYTCTBIe KaKoro 6m to hii 6mjio aeveHMa, Rar paHeHBIX, Tar II 6ojibhmx. e) McnOJIB3OBanne na THiKCJion usuvecEo pa6oTC MCTOI[eHHLIX ii 60JBHBIX JIoe. jk) CiiCTCMaTimecKiie n3neHIS n u3eBaTeJIBCTBa. Kak ykasano bhhic, Hapezkamas MeAMIMHCKas IIOMOIIb oTcyT- CTBOBaJia. 9to IIOKTBepagaerea ne TOJIBKO pesyJbraraMI OcBlereJIb- CTBOBaHHI OCB0O/KHeHHBIX 113 areps (OTCyTCTBue nepBMMHo xupyprH- ‘eckol o6pa6oTKii, He3aKIBalonure paHM c pacnaBeuweM n oMeprBe- HIICM MarKHX TkaHe II o6lIJIbIIbIM orgeJaeMBIM, OTCyTCTBIIC MMMowJIM- 3anuu koHevHocre npn paneHHSX c nOBpengeHweM kocrek n t. n.), ho ii AaHHbIMI cyAe6no-MeAiinnncKoro McCJTeXOBaHMS oKcryMiiponaHHMx Tpy noB (hamune KyJIbreir, HMeBIIIMX bha KYJbre nocue TpaBMaruyecKo# amnyTalHu 6e3 BCHEO xupypruvecko o6pa6oTKii). VcraHOBJIeHHbI HeMeIKIM KOManAOBaniieM n aMuuwcrpanei b CaByTCKOM arepe BOeHHOIITeHHbIX peHM npuBeI b oruomeHMM OCBO- 6ojkachhhx KpacHo Apmme, Kak oto bhaho M3 aKTOB OcBlHeTeJIBCTBO- BaHHN, K TOMy, hto: a) Vake no opore b cobotckhc rocniiTajiH ymep.to 7 yeJ., a b nepBbe Ahh npe6biBaHiiH b hhx — 47. 6) y 435 JIMII no 525 bJIO ycraHOBJeHO kparei creneHII wcroneHxe n kaxeKcMH. b) OcroaHeHHoMy reveHMIO pan b 198 cuyyasx. r) y 31 veoBera — KoncTaTiipoBanM neuxuYeCEwe zao3eBaHHa. 8. Bee H3J103keHloe BbIe b aHHOM cuyyae roBopirr c IOJIHoM h coBepmeHno onpexeeHHOCTBIO o mpexuamepenno# opranmsanun pexuMa c HeJIblo cucremarueckoro n IIahoMepnoro ymeplBJeHIS coBerCKMx BoeHHoIIeHHBIX. Hukaras o6beKTiiBHaii o6cTanoBKa ne MOker 06b- HCHITb Bcex Tex ycJiOBiiii, npn KOTOpBIX copepaJICE BOeHHOIIJTeHHBe b Jarepe. Tom ouee, Kar HBCTByeT na marepnaJoB xexa, B Hemerux BoeHHbX CKJiaAax b r. Curasyre bLII rpomaabe 3anacu npoOBOJIBCTBIIS, B BOCHIIHX arrekax — MCAIIKaMCHTOB II mepeBS30MHBIX MarepnaJOB. 9. IIpuuHbI cMepTI rpasgan, TpynM KOTopux 06HapyjKeHH b MCCTax MaccoBoro 3axoponeHua na reppuropuM bIBlero uareps BoenxomeH- HHX (k K)ry ot BOAonanopnoit 6annu) — TSSEeJIbe orHecrpeBHBe pa- HeHHH roJOBbI, compoBO:kaBIeca rpyoMMii nOBpencgenMSMM roJOBHOro MO3ra, ii vacro b o6jiacTii e IKM3HeHHO Ba:HBIMM ierrpaxu, pacnOJIOSReH- HbIMM B 3axnei vepenuoi nMe. O nocJeAHeM CBIIACTCJIbCTByeT vacrora noBpc>KAeniiii vemyu 3aTblJIOVHo koctii, kocthhx xpaeB 3arbroyuoro OTBepCTHS, nepBoro meinoro IO3BOHKa, HCKSIIOMWTeJIbHas vacrora MHoro- n KPYIIHOOCKOJIbHaTBIX nepeJOMOB EpBIIIIEM vepena n iieoAHOKpaTHoe Haunuure Tpenu b KOCTaX OcHOBaHuH vepena. Merog ymepussenMSI rux rpakar — paccrpe 113 aBrOMaruueCkoro opyaus,o vem cBIereJTB- CTByeT ‘acroTa MHOHcecTBeHHMX, 2—4 BXOXHIbIX OrBepcr# na oahom h TOM 5KC vepere. IIocurepuee ke CBIIACTCJIbCTByeT O IIJIOTHOCTII OrHS, KO- TOPbIM IIPpOM3BOHIIJIOCb ymepnBenne B 3rHX moruax rtoge. 10. B pacKpbITbIX moruuax IV ji XI aocojnoTiioe 60JIBIIMIIHCTBO TpynoB upunaprenkaJo keHIIIHaM II ACTHM. TpynoB B3pOCJIBIX My»UMH o6na- pyweno tojibko ABa. CooTHomeHne kencKIX I AeTCEHX TpynoB: 101 k 81, t. e. okojio 40% TpynoB othociitch k actum. 11. Tpynu b Moruax excar npaBMJIBHBIMII pagaM, iiapajiJiejibHO AIIHHIIKY MOrIJIbI, 3aTbIJIKaMII KBcpxy; BepxHAS IIOJIOBMHa ryJOBuIa oAnoro Tpyna eKIIT na HMSKHei nOJIOBHHe xpyroro. Bee TpynM o6pa- IeHb rooBaMu k OAHOMy Kpaio MOrHJIb (monepevnoMy). Taroe pac- noJozkeHue TpynoB b Moriuiax mpunyagaer CUMTaTB, «ito paccrpes- Baemble 3aroHHIcb paseTbIMII b mormuy, yKJiaAMBajincb psjamu n 3a- TeM yiinHToiKajincb BbcTpeuaMu b rojioBy. CsugeTeJIECRHe MOkazauus IIOJIHOCTblO IIOXTBepaaITeH onucaHHBIM pacnojioiKeinieM TpynoB b Moruax. 12. CaMbil aKT paccrpeJBaHHS rpasgan b amax, pacnojioiKemic TpynoB b pacKpbITbIX MorwIax, Hauuuue HenOBpe:KHeHHBIX vepenoB, a Takike PaA CBHJeTeJIbCICIIX IOkasanu 1O3BOJISIOT CUraTB BOBMOSKHBIM 3acblarne HeCKOM 5KIIBMX JIK>ACii. 13. Cocroauue TPYIIOB b pacKpbITBIX moruaax yKa3HBaeT, vro aa- xopoHeHne nx 0JIKHO EITb othcccho k nepnoxy ot 4—5 vecsieB ao 2—2,5jict ao HceJiCAOBaniiH TpynOB. 14. IIn Herei JiHACHTiiiJuiKamiii auwocre MoryT bITB IICIIOJTB30- BaiiM napellbe npn aKcryMaunn IOKYMeHTBI (nacnopTa, Epacnoapmei- civile KHIISKICII, BoeHlIbI 6iijict, pa3yse cnpaBEM, dororaproyEM ii t. n.), oTAeJIbHbe npeAMeTBI iniAiiBiiAyajibHoro MOIE3OBaHMS, ojexpa, OAcnjia e IOAYIIIKaMn ii t. a. YkasaHHbe XOKYMeHTBI npuraraIrcs k uacrosiemy aKTy. HTo kacaeres ompexeueHHS koJveCTBa saxopoHeHHBIX TpyilOB BOCHHO- IIeHHbIX ji Apyrux COBeTCKHX rpangan na reppwropuu Boenxoro ro- poAKa ii npuIeraronux MecTHocrei, Komhcchh cuwraer iieo6xoAiiMHM OTMeTIITB cuIexyiolee:H1473-0113 a) IIpu 3axoponeHMH TpynoB cucreMarHHeCKM MMeJO MecTO yMbIIIeH- hog coKpMTiic eCTBMTeJIbHoro oJMeCTBa 3axopoHeHHBIX. TaK, na xpecrax, naxopanuxca y MorJI NN 623, 624 ykasaHb amwM 3a- xopoHCHHHx, npuueM na nepBOM — yrasaro 8 amMJIM#, a na bto- poM — 12; npii pacKpBITHM xe MOrMJI OrasaJocb: b mormae N 623 He 8, a 32rpyna, b mormare N ne 12, a 18 TpynoB. IIpnMeHHJIOCB MHorocuoHoe 3axoponenwe TpynoB c 3acblmakMeM rpyHTOM OTeJIBHBIX cuoeB. TaK, npu pacKpHTHI MOrMJIBI N 625, no M3BJeveHMM 113 nee 10 TpynoB, 6mji ouapyaeH cuo rpyHra b 30 cm. TOJIIIHHo#, IIOA EOTOPBIM CHOBa 6b1310 onapyaceHO 4 Tpyna, IOA THMM TpynaMii OkasaJIcs cuo rpyHra b 20 cm., a no3 hum OMATb HaxoMJIOCL 7 TpynoB. AnaxorMyuas KapTHHa uMeua mccto mpu pacKpBITHM MOrHJIBI N 627. KpoMe roro, npu pacKpbITHH MOrHJIBI N 8 Broporo oserra (nepex 1-m KopnycoM) Okasaocb, TO no M3BJeveHMM M3 Hee 30 TpynoB IOA cJoeM rpyHra HaxoAMTCS 60JIbloe KOJinnecTBO vacre TpynoB 3Hauu- TeJIbHO oJbme 3aBHOCTH, b BMge OTeJIBHBIX yacre CreJeTOB n yepenOB. 6) IIpoM3BOAMJIaCb MacKnpoBKa MOrMJI, BbpakaBmasca b OTCyTCTBHH HaMOTMJIBHBIX XOJIMOB, npokagke qopoaek nag MeCTOM 3axopoHeHMS, rge no pacKpBITMM onapyMBaJMCb Tpynia b mormaax, pasMepom ot 4,5 x 3 MeTrpOB 30 9 x 3 Merpa, ruyMH0I 30 2 MeTpOB, npnueM 3a- aerauve TpynoB ot IIOBepxHOCTH 3eMJIM 6bIIO na paccTOsHMM 30—40 cm. b) Haxokgenne HaMOTMJIBHBIX XOJIMOB 11 3aMacKpoBaHHbIX MorMJI b caMbIX pa3JIHbIX MecTax; TaK MeKAy mepBEIM KopnycoM n qoporo M3 r. CxaBYTBI b ceJo Tanku na momaAM b 1,37 ra MMeJOCb 639 XOJIMOB n 4 CKpbITBIX MOrMJIBI, nepex nepBMM KopnycoM OkasaJOcb 11 Moriui, pazmepom oxoqane 30 14 x 1,5 Merpa; na paccTOaHMM 77 MeTpOB ot inocce no HanpaBJIeHMIO E BogOHanopro amne ene 44 HaMOrMJIBHbIX xojiMa, y BO3OHanopHOii amHn —11 MOrMJI pasmepom, AOXOASIIMM 30 9x4 Merpa; b Jiecy 3a goporo na c. TamkM onapyeHB 3 MacKM- poBaHHBIX MOrMJIbI pa3MepoM 30 9 x 3 Merpa; mepex 6-m KopnycoM — b MecTe HaxokgeHMS OpoEM Hagena MornJia pasMepoM 4,5 x 3 Merpa; b cesepo-3anaHom anpaBJIeHHM ot 6-ro Kopnyca, Hegaueko ot inocce, Bexymero na IIIeneTOBKy, oxasaJocb 3 HaMOrMJIBHbIX xojiMa, b to BpeMs, Kak MOrMJI onapyenO raM ke 6; pasmep 3thx MOrMJI ot 6 x 2 Merpa 30 65 X 2,5 merpa. Ho pacKpBITHM 3THX MorMJ B mix Take orasaocb 60Jbloe EoJIMVeCTBO TpynoB. r) PaspocaHHOCTB Meer 3axoponeHIIS, TIaTeJIbHas nx MacKMpOBKa, orpoMHas momab 11 mepeceveHHas xecucras MecTHOCTb HCKJIOHMJIH BO3MONKHOCTE o6Hapy>KHTb bcc mecra 3axoponeHHS, oco6chho Y"TBIBas MOKa3aHa paga cBugerexe 0 TOM, rO MuorOWMCJIeHHbIe paccrpeJIbI H 3axoponeHMS BOeHHOmIeHHBIX mpon3BOAMJIMCB na Bcex IYTAX cuegOBaHHS Mx na pa6ory 11 oparHo b aarepb.
